channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: America's Homes Are Piggy Banks That Few People Can Afford to Raid
item.description: Only a minority of mainly older homeowners are in a position to take advantage of the historic run-up in house prices.

item.title: Cisco reports fourth straight quarter of declining revenue
item.description: Cisco reported better-than-expected results for the latest quarter but revenue continues to shrink.

item.title: Disney doesn't plan to change its TV networks portfolio anytime soon
item.description: Disney doesn't foresee parting with its TV networks, more than a year after CEO Bob Iger went public with the consideration.

item.title: Rocket Lab stock surges almost 30% to near all-time high after company's Q3 results
item.description: Rocket Lab jumped in trading after the company reported third-quarter results.

item.title: Disney stock surges on streaming growth, guidance
item.description: Revenue for Disney's entertainment segment – which includes the traditional TV networks, direct-to-consumer streaming and films – increased 14% year o...

item.title: Is Anyone Crazy Enough to Audit Super Micro Computer?
item.description: After Ernst & Young walked away, all eyes should be on its previous auditor. The risks include Nasdaq delisting.

item.title: Here's why investors are so excited about Disney's quarterly results
item.description: After several quarters of underperformance and investor frustration, CEO Robert Iger's turnaround plans appear to be working.

item.title: Dollar Might Reverse Lower After Post-Election Gains
item.description: The dollar eased and the currency’s strength following the election probably won’t last, with Trump’s proposed policies expected to undermine the doll...

item.title: U.S. Two-30-Year Treasury Yield Spread Has Room to Widen
item.description: It is somewhat surprising that longer-dated Treasury yields haven’t been under more pressure over the past few days, BlueBay said, and it continues to...

item.title: The $55 Billion Customer Exodus Rocking Franklin Templeton
item.description: The Justice Department and other federal agencies are investigating trades by Wamco’s star fund manager.
